tool_description:
NOTE: You need an API-Key to use this API. See README for more details.
The Cancer Imaging Archive (TCIA) is a public repository of cancer images and related clinical data for the express purpose of enabling open science research. Currently over 26 million radiologic images of cancer are contained in this repository. The API allows you to query metadata and download images from the various public collections available on TCIA
name: The Cancer Imaging Archive
title: The Cancer Imaging Archive

api_list.name: getCollectionValues
api_list.description: Set of all TCIA collection names

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Specify output type. Allowed values CSV/HTML/XML/JSON

api_list.name: getModalityValues

optional_parameters.name: Collection
optional_parameters.description: A label used to name a set of images collected for a specific trial or other reason.  Assigned during the process of curating the data.

optional_parameters.name: BodyPartExamined
optional_parameters.description: Entered on a per collection basis using relevant SNOMED terms. (DICOM Tag  0018x0015)

optional_parameters.name: Modality
optional_parameters.description: Standard DICOM definition (DICOM Tag 0008x0060)

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Specify output type. Allowed values CSV/HTML/XML/JSON

api_list.name: getBodyPartValues
api_list.description: Set of all body part names filtered by query keys

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Specify output type. Allowed values CSV/HTML/XML/JSON

optional_parameters.name: Collection
optional_parameters.description: A label used to name a set of images collected for a specific trial or other reason.  Assigned during the process of curating the data.

optional_parameters.name: BodyPartExamined
optional_parameters.description: Standard DICOM definition (0018x0015)

optional_parameters.name: Modality
optional_parameters.description: Standard DICOM definition (0008x0060)

api_list.name: getPatientStudy
api_list.description: Returns a set of patient/study objects filtered by query keys

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Specify output type. Allowed values CSV/HTML/XML/JSON

optional_parameters.name: Collection
optional_parameters.description: A label used to name a set of images collected for a specific trial or other reason.  Assigned during the process of curating the data.

optional_parameters.name: PatientID
optional_parameters.description: Has been de-identified as part of submission process (DICOM Tag  0010x0020)

optional_parameters.name: StudyInstanceUID
optional_parameters.description: Has been de-identified as part of submission process. (DICOM Tag 0020x000D)

api_list.name: getSeries
api_list.description: Returns a set of series objects filtered by query keys

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Specify output type. Allowed values CSV/HTML/XML/JSON

optional_parameters.name: Collection
optional_parameters.description: A label used to name a set of images collected for a specific trial or other reason.  Assigned during the process of curating the data.

optional_parameters.name: PatientID
optional_parameters.description: Has been de-identified as part of submission process (DICOM Tag  0010x0020)

optional_parameters.name: StudyInstanceUID
optional_parameters.description: Has been de-identified as part of submission process. (DICOM Tag 0020x000D)

optional_parameters.name: Modality
optional_parameters.description: Standard DICOM definition (0008x0060)

api_list.name: getImage
api_list.description: Set of images in a zip file. NOTE: The resulting zip files can become very large. We strongly advise not testing  this endpoint via Mashape. Instead, consider using curl with the -o option set to output.zip

required_parameters.name: SeriesInstanceUID
required_parameters.description: Has been de-identified as part of submission process. (DICOM Tag 0020x000E)

api_list.name: getPatient
api_list.description: Returns a set of patient objects filtered by query keys

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Specify output type. Allowed values CSV/HTML/XML/JSON

optional_parameters.name: Collection
optional_parameters.description: A label used to name a set of images collected for a specific trial or other reason.  Assigned during the process of curating the data.

api_list.name: getManufacturerValues
api_list.description: Returns a set of all manufacturer names filtered by query keys

optional_parameters.name: format

optional_parameters.description: A label used to name a set of images collected for a specific trial or other reason.  Assigned during the process of curating the data.
